column5: Peaceful seclusion in the country yet only 5 miles to downtown. Spacious one bedroom, 850 sq.ft. suite, lots of storage, full- size appliances, washer/dryer, parking at your door (no steps), high-speed WIFI, premium satellite channels, safe, clean and pet friendly (pet fee). Spectacular long distance views. I may be able to unblock your needed dates -let me know. Perfect for long term stays. Member of C of C and Nac Convention and Visitors' Bureau. See their websites for numerous events.
